did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Dept. of Landscape Architecture design problems, 1924-1940.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Exchange problems between Cornell and other universities, and landscape problems set by Bryant Fleming and Eugene D. Montillon.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Exchange problems between Cornell and other universities, and landscape problems set by Bryant Fleming and Eugene D. Montillon; survey data and planting plans, 1908-1921; student projects, 1913-1931; student work for the American Academy in Rome by Edward Lawson, R. E. Griswold, and others; files on New York State institutions used as study data, 1898-1933; plans and measured drawings of historic estates by E. Gorton Davis, 1914-1929.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Dept. of Landscape Architecture design problems, #15/5/1433. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

unittitle.extref: Link to the finding aid. PDF file.

scopecontent.p: Not all the material in the collection is covered by this guide.
